pageProduct.name: Wagner Professional Immunity Force 30 Vegetarian Capsules
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Immunity Force

Warnings

Vitamins and minerals can only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Do not use if cap seal or if inner seal is missing, torn or broken Contains sulfites.

Common Uses

Immunity Force is a comprehensive formula combining the well known ingredients andrographis, echinacea, olive leaf, vitamin c and zinc. Andrographis relieves sore throat and the severity of symptoms of mild upper respiratory tract infections and decreases symptoms of common cold, including runny nose, cough, fatigue and restless sleep. Formulated with ingredients such as vitamin c and zinc to support health immune system function

Ingredients

Andrographis paniculata (Andrographis) ext. dry conc. 192.9 mg from minimum dry leaf 2.7 g stand. to contain andrographolide 67.5 mg Olea europaea (Olive) leaf ext. dry conc. 100 mg from minimum dry leaf 1.8 g stand. to contain oleuropein 40 mg Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) ext. dry conc. 166.7 mg from dry root 1 g (1,000 mg) Sambucus nigra (Elderberry) ext. dry conc. 14.3 mg from dry fruit 100 mg Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 275 mg Zinc citrate dihydrate 15.6 mg equiv. to Zinc 5 mg

Directions

RECOMMENDED DOSAGE: WARNING: Andrographis may cause allergic reactions in some people. If you have a severe reaction (such as anaphylaxis) stop use and seek immediate medical attention. Adults only: Take 1 hard capsule per day Or as directed by your healthcare professional.
